name: The Liar
description:
This game has been made for the SecretSantaJam.

"The Liar" is a totally random generated game in which you have to find who the liar is among a group of characters. Talk to them, find some clues and make your guess. Maybe Jimmy is the liar... or Stacy... or even Mark! Hmmm...

Have fun! ^^

--------------------------------------------------
CONTROLS:
Mouse.
F: Toggle fullscreen.
